Detailed Description

CmdInsertSeparatorKit class is the insert command for TSeparatorKit nodes stored in the command stack.

CmdInsertSeparatorKit represents a single TSeparatorKit insertion action on a scene, insert a new TSeparatorKit node to the scene.

Definition at line 54 of file CmdInsertSeparatorKit.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

CmdInsertSeparatorKit::CmdInsertSeparatorKit ( TSeparatorKit *  separatorKit,
const QModelIndex &  parentIndex,
SceneModel *  model,
QUndoCommand *  parent = 0 
)

Creates a new group node insert command that adds a separatorKit to parentIndex node in the model.

If parent is not null, this command is appended to parent's child list and then owns this command.

Member Function Documentation

void CmdInsertSeparatorKit::redo ( ) [virtual]

Applies a change to the model. After redo() the model will contain new group node.

undo().

void CmdInsertSeparatorKit::undo ( ) [virtual]

Reverts model state. After undo() is called, the node with the parentIndex will not contain a separatorKit node.

See also:
redo().
